roleset.name: bite, eat, greedily
roleset.note: CHOMP-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: munch (39.2) (from chomp.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Hopefully not eating kind of chomping
example.text: "Tiny purple American flag peanut skillets," said Don King as he chomped on a cigar.

example.name: Idiomatic expression
example.text: South Korea will be chomping at the bit to retaliate.
